        protected PortI getPortFromURI(AbstractComponent owner,
                               java.lang.String portURI)
        return the reference to the port, if found otherwise null.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:

        portURI - URI of the sought port.
